title: Understanding Spreadsheet Formulas
text: Formulas in spreadsheets are used to perform calculations and automate data processing. They can reference other cells to dynamically update results.

title: Common Uses of Formulas
text: Formulas are often used to sum up values, calculate averages, or perform complex mathematical operations based on cell data.

hintAnswer: To automatically calculate values based on other cells' data.
title: Identifying the Correct Use of Formulas
text: Which of the following is a correct use of a formula in a spreadsheet?
choices: To automatically calculate values based on other cells' data.
To change the font style of the text in the spreadsheet.
To insert a new image into the spreadsheet.
To adjust the column width of the spreadsheet.
